name: DataMigrationTool
description: With the Azure Cosmos DB Data Migration tool, you can easily migrate data to Azure Cosmos DB
author: Winvision BV

inputs.name: logErrorLog
inputs.label: Errorlog
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional. Name of the CSV file to redirect data transfer failures

inputs.name: logOverwriteErrorLog
inputs.label: Overwrite Errorlog
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional. Overwrite error log file

inputs.name: sourceType
inputs.label: Source Type

options.JsonFile: JsonFile: Reads data from JSON files, either one or multiple
options.DocumentDB: Cosmos DB: Reads data from Cosmos DB collections

inputs.helpMarkDown: Source type for data migration

inputs.name: sourceJsonFiles
inputs.label: Json files
inputs.helpMarkDown: One or more file search patterns to read JSON from.

inputs.name: sourceJsonDecompress
inputs.label: Decompress
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional. If source files should be decompressed with GZip

inputs.name: sourceDocumentDBConnectionstring
inputs.label: ConnectionString
inputs.helpMarkDown: Connection string (example: "AccountEndpoint=xyz;AccountKey=xyz;Database=xyz")

inputs.name: sourceDocumentDBCollection
inputs.label: Collection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Regex pattern to match one or more documents collection names

inputs.name: sourceDocumentDBQueryType
inputs.label: Query type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Query type: File path or inline

inputs.name: sourceDocumentDBQuery
inputs.label: Enter Query
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional. Documents query to execute

inputs.name: sourceDocumentDBQueryFile
inputs.label: Select Query File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional. Documents query to execute

inputs.name: sourceDocumentDBInternalFields
inputs.label: Internal fields
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional. Preserve internal CosmosDB fields in the output

inputs.name: destinationType
inputs.label: Destination Type

options.JsonFile: JsonFile: Stores data in a single JSON file with root array element
options.DocumentDB: Cosmos DB: Uploads data into partitioned CosmosDB collection

inputs.helpMarkDown: Destination type for data migration

inputs.name: destinationJsonFiles
inputs.label: Json file
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the file to write data to.

inputs.name: destinationJsonCompress
inputs.label: Compress
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional. If target file should be compressed with GZip

inputs.name: destinationJsonPrettify
inputs.label: Prettify
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional. If JSON in the target file should be indented

inputs.name: destinationJsonOverwrite
inputs.label: Overwrite
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional. Overwrite target file

inputs.name: destinationDocumentDBConnectionstring
inputs.label: ConnectionString
inputs.helpMarkDown: Connection string (example: "AccountEndpoint=xyz;AccountKey=xyz;Database=xyz")

inputs.name: destinationDocumentDBCollection
inputs.label: Collection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Name of the documents collection

inputs.name: destinationDocumentDBCollectionThroughput
inputs.label: Collection Throughput
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional, default is 1000. Specifies maximum throughput of the collection

inputs.name: destinationDocumentDBPartitionKey
inputs.label: PartitionKey
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional. Path to the property to use as hash partitioning key (example: "/deviceId")

inputs.name: destinationDocumentDBIndexingPolicyType
inputs.label: Indexing policy
inputs.helpMarkDown: Indexing policy type: File path or inline

inputs.name: destinationDocumentDBIndexingPolicy
inputs.label: Indexing Policy
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional. Indexing policy for the collection

inputs.name: destinationDocumentDBIndexingPolicyFile
inputs.label: Indexing Policy File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional. Path to the file containing indexing policy for the collection

inputs.name: destinationDocumentDBIdField
inputs.label: Id Field
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional. Name of the source field that should be treated as document ID

inputs.name: destinationDocumentDBDisableIdGeneration
inputs.label: Disable Id Generation
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional. Disable automatic generation of document ids

inputs.name: destinationDocumentDBUpdateExisting
inputs.label: Update Existing
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional. Update existing documents with the same ID

inputs.name: destinationDocumentDBParallelRequests
inputs.label: Parallel Requests
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional, default is 10. Number of parallel document create requests

inputs.name: destinationDocumentDBDates
inputs.label: Dates
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional, default is String. Specifies how timestamps should be persisted: String, Epoch, Both
